page.title: 06TESCO SUPERSTORE CHELMSFORD
page.content:
Tesco's is situated at the southern end of the{Springfield Road,}extending from there back to the{River Chelmer.} It is open six days a week. The store covers 36,080 sq.feet of floor space and has two carparks;one above the store has 360 spaces and the ground-level one has 200 spaces.
380 staff are employed here, working in the offices,as stock shelf-fillers, on the till checkouts and in the store bakery.The store sells foodstuffs, electrical goods,wines and spirits, toys,garden items and clothing.
Shoppers use self-service trolleys; there is even a low-level cashtill for {disabled shoppers in wheelchairs.}The customers can use lifts and pedestrian walkways to push the trolleys directly to their cars to off-load their goods.
